messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Cranium Cadoo for Kids?  (LOL games?)
messages.msgSnippet: We love that game here.  Ds is 6 1 / 2 but got it last year for Christmas. We’ve had a ball with it!  Another game that we love is called Stare Jr. You look
messages.messageBody:
We love that game here. Ds is 6 1 / 2 but got it last year for Christmas.
Weve had a ball with it! Another game that we love is called Stare Jr.
You look at a picture for 60 seconds, roll a die, then answer the question
on the back of the picture card that matches your roll. You learn to look
at the minute details after learning the kinds of questions that are asked.
It is a scream even for adults.

Shan

-----Original Message-----
From: cmkerin [mailto:cmkerin@...]
Sent: Friday, October 24, 2003 7:06 PM
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Cranium Cadoo for Kids? (LOL games?)

Hello everyone,

I'd love to find a game that the whole family likes. My kids don't seem to
like traditional board games much but
I thought that Cranium Cadoo for Kids looked like it could be a lot of
laughs. I'd appreciate learning what others
thought of the game or if anyone has other ideas of games that like because
they are funny.

Thank You,
Joycee
